description: This dashboard uses the system metrics collected from the `hostmetrics` receiver to show CPU, Memory, Disk, Network and Filesystem usage
name: Host Metrics - Bird EYE View V2
title: Host Metrics - bird EYE view

filter.expression: deployment.environment = 'DEV-VM' AND host.name != ''   AND mountpoint = '/' AND state = 'used'
deployment.environment = 'DEV-VM' AND host.name != ''  AND mountpoint = '/' AND state = 'free'
